meanings.definition: To select from a number of possibilities
meanings.sent1: I will choose the red shirt for the party.
meanings.sent2: She always takes a long time to choose what to eat for lunch.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to choose the sunniest spot in the house to nap.
meanings.sent4: In life, we must choose our battles wisely.
meanings.sent5: When faced with a difficult decision, it is important to carefully choose the best option.

meanings.sent1: He will choose to watch a movie rather than go for a walk.
meanings.sent2: Do you think she will choose the blue dress for the event?
meanings.sent3: I choose to believe that good things will happen.
meanings.sent4: Sometimes we have to choose between what is easy and what is right.
meanings.sent5: When you choose to be kind, you make the world a better place.

meanings.definition: To make a choice from a number of options
meanings.sent1: Let's choose a movie to watch together tonight.
meanings.sent2: It can be challenging to choose the best gift for someone.
meanings.sent3: I choose chocolate over vanilla every time.
meanings.sent4: Life is full of opportunities to choose our own path.
meanings.sent5: When you choose happiness, everything else falls into place.
